entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 28 April 2023
